ComicInfo.Summary:
After struggling under student loans and start-up costs, two graduates try a hail mary: they journey to Central America to find a mysterious tribe that grants wishes. Once they arrive, they discover that getting their wish may not be as easy as they hoped.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | EricJ & Victor Bartlett | 1 | B | Cover B | Gregbo Watson & Jorge Cortes | 3 | C | Cover C | Mary Sanapo & Vinicius Andrade | 4 | D | Wizard World Philadelphia Exclusive Sketch Variant Cover, Limited to 300 | None | 2 | Note: The digital edition (5/4/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
